attributes.action: Allow boys in Secondary schools to wear shorts
attributes.additional_details: We don’t want our boys over heating and shorts can look smart too!
attributes.background: When the uk has heatwaves, and general hot weather, boys from secondary schools still have to go in full length trousers, and blazers in most schools. Shorts will still look smart but will help them slightly to stay cooler, like the girls are allowed with skirts.

rejection.details:
School uniform policies are a matter for individual schools, but we have published the following petitions, some of which you might like to sign:

Require schools to allow students to wear PE kits on hot days: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588797

Make school uniform optional for students in secondary schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582011
